players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I saw Charlie last night and he seemed fine. I have no idea what happened to him."
You: "Bob and Diana are lying, I'm the mafioso."
Diana: "I'm the mafioso, as Alice claims. I saw Charlie last night and he seemed fine. There's no evidence of foul play from my observation."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I saw Charlie last night and he seemed fine. I have no idea what happened to him."
Alice: "Bob and Diana are lying, I'm the mafioso."
